## MetadataCache.getMetadataFor() method

Returns the metadata for the specified resource name.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resourceName | string | The name of the resource. |

**Returns:**

[Metadata](./foundation-comms.metadata.md)
